title: My Personal Journey
shortDescription: B.Tech CSE student from GL Bajaj, passionate about coding, creativity, dance & design. Based in Mathura, originally from Bihar.
fullContent:
1. Academic Background

I am currently a B.Tech 2nd year student from GL Bajaj Group of Institutions, Mathura, 2028 batch. I love dance and listen to Bollywood music. I am creative, I can craft, and design rangolis.

1.1 Current Education

Pursuing B.Tech in Computer Science at GL Bajaj Group of Institutions.

1.2 Academic Year

Second year student, expected graduation in 2028.

1.3 Study Location

Based in Mathura for my engineering studies.

2. Personal Interests

I live with my family who are really supportive. I do have an annoying brother but deep down I love him, along with my mother and father. We all live together.

2.1 Hobbies and Activities

Dance, crafting, rangoli design, and listening to Bollywood music.

2.2 Creative Pursuits

Expressing creativity through various art forms and traditional crafts.

2.3 Family Life

Living with supportive family including parents and brother.

3. Background and Origin

I am based in Aligarh but was born in Bihar. Currently, I am in Mathura for my studies.

3.1 Place of Birth

Originally from Bihar, carrying rich cultural heritage.

3.2 Current Residence

Based in Aligarh, studying in Mathura.

3.3 Cultural Background

Blend of Bihari roots and experiences from different regions.

4. Future Aspirations

I want to travel to international countries; for example, I love the culture of Japan, Italy, and others. Yeah, I am a Computer Science student.

4.1 Travel Dreams

Aspiring to explore international destinations and cultures.

4.2 Favorite Destinations

Particularly interested in Japan and Italy's rich cultural heritage.

4.3 Academic Focus

Dedicated Computer Science student with passion for technology.

5. Professional Journey

Building a career in technology while pursuing personal interests.

5.1 Career Goals

Aiming for excellence in computer science and software development.

5.2 Skill Development

Continuous learning in programming and technology.

5.3 Work-Life Balance

Maintaining interests outside academics for holistic growth.
